claim.text: Predicting financial risk is an essential task in financial market.
claim.exact_quote: Predicting financial risk is an essential task in financial market.

evidence.evidence_text: Predicting financial risks of publicly traded companies is an essential task in capital market participants.
evidence.exact_quote: Predicting financial risks of publicly traded companies is an essential task in capital market participants.

claim.text: Textual information in a firm’s financial statement can be used to predict its stock’s risk level.
claim.exact_quote: Based on this assumption, a burgeoning body of research, both in finance and computational linguistics, has studied predicting stock volatility using various textual sources, including company disclosed reports (Kogan et al., 2009), public news articles (Tetlock, 2007), company earnings call transcripts (Wang and Hua, 2014), and social media (Ding et al., 2015).

evidence.evidence_text: Prior research has shown that textual information in a firm’s financial statement can be used to predict its stock’s risk level.
evidence.exact_quote: Prior research has shown that textual information in a firm’s financial statement can be used to predict its stock’s risk level.

claim.text: CEO’s vocal features, such as emotions and voice tones, can reveal the firm’s performance.
claim.exact_quote: There are anecdotal evidences that CEO’s nonverbal features, such as emotions and voice tones, can also be used to reveal firm’s performance.

evidence.evidence_text: There are anecdotal evidences that CEO’s nonverbal features, such as emotions and voice tones, can also be used to reveal firm’s performance.
evidence.limitations: Anecdotal evidence is not as strong as experimental evidence.
evidence.exact_quote: There are anecdotal evidences that CEO’s nonverbal features, such as emotions and voice tones, can also be used to reveal firm’s performance.

claim.text: Multimodal learning with audio and text can indeed reduce prediction error, compared to previous work that relies on text only.
claim.exact_quote: Our empirical results confirm that audio modality (vocal cues) help to improve volatility prediction accuracy and may reveal the fact that market participants listen to not only what CEOs say but also how CEOs say it.

evidence.evidence_text: Our empirical results confirm that audio modality (vocal cues) help to improve volatility prediction accuracy and may reveal the fact that market participants listen to not only what CEOs say but also how CEOs say it.
evidence.exact_quote: Our empirical results confirm that audio modality (vocal cues) help to improve volatility prediction accuracy and may reveal the fact that market participants listen to not only what CEOs say but also how CEOs say it.

claim.text: The proposed multimodal deep regression model (MDRM) model that jointly model CEO’s verbal (from text) and vocal (from audio) information in a conference call.
claim.exact_quote: To fill the gap, we propose a multimodal deep regression model (MDRM) that jointly model CEO’s verbal (from text) and vocal (from audio) information in a conference call.

evidence.evidence_text: In our work, we propose a stock volatility prediction pipeline using company earnings conference call audio and text data.
evidence.exact_quote: In our work, we propose a stock volatility prediction pipeline using company earnings conference call audio and text data.

evidence.evidence_text: We propose a Multimodal Deep Regression Model (MDRM) that jointly model CEO’s verbal (from text) and vocal (from audio) information in a conference call.
evidence.exact_quote: We propose a Multimodal Deep Regression Model (MDRM) that jointly model CEO’s verbal (from text) and vocal (from audio) information in a conference call.

claim.text: Our model that jointly considers verbal and vocal features achieves significant and substantial prediction error reduction.
claim.exact_quote: Empirical results show that our model that jointly considers verbal and vocal features achieves significant and substantial prediction error reduction.

evidence.evidence_text: Our empirical results show that our model that jointly considers verbal and vocal features achieves significant and substantial prediction error reduction.
evidence.exact_quote: Our empirical results show that our model that jointly considers verbal and vocal features achieves significant and substantial prediction error reduction.
